anya-e0605n0:4: Yo lokatthāya buddho dhanasutabhariyāaṅgajīve cajitvā pūretvā āramiyo tidasamanupame bodhipakkhīyadhamme,
anya-e0605n0:5: Patvā bodhiṃ visuddhaṃ sakalaguṇadadaṃ seṭṭhabhūto tiloke,
anya-e0605n0:6: Katvā dukkhassa antaṃ katasubhajanataṃ dukkhato mocayittha.
anya-e0605n0:9: Nāhu yenapi tulyo kusalamahimato uttamo bhūtaloke tassevāyaṃ uvimhaṃ suvipulamamalaṃ bodhisambhārabhūtaṃ,
anya-e0605n0:10: Hetuṃ hetvānurūpaṃ sugatagataphalaṃ bhāsato me suṇātha.
